resources.string: Manage local photos: Find/Copy/Edit-Exif and show in Gallery or Map.

" Photo Gallery app to manage local photos:
Features:
* Fast find photos by tags(keywords), (sub-)folder, date, geo , title, ... * Display result in gallery or geographic map from openstreetmap. * Filemanagement: copy, move, rename, delete, send, Incremental Photo Backup, ... . * Support for Virtual Albums. * Edit exif metadata: date, title, description, tags(keywords), geo, rating, .... * AutoProcessing: on-move automatically rename photo-files and/or add metadata, * Can handle big image collections (20000+ images in 1000+ folders). * Small memory footprint (1.5 MB), Works on old low-memory android 4.0 devices * Uses Android's image content-provider. No initial image scan neccessary. * Extended photo media scanner for Exif, IPTC, XMP
Privacy:
* Can hide photos from other gallery-apps/image-pickers. * Vault mode: If enabled unwanted photos cannot be seen and dangerous operations (i.e. delete) are prohibited. This way you can safely hand over your device to someone else. * Photos are kept on local device. No upload to third party. * No adds, no usertracking, free open source, available on f-droid
Required Android Permissions:
* INTERNET: to download map data from Open Streetmap Server * ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE and ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: to find out if wifi/internet is online to start downloaded geodata * WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE to cache downloaded map data in local file system and to do file operations with the photos * READ_LOGS to read and save potential crash-logs to a textfile. . "
